Package arcade.patch.env.lattice

Class PatchLatticeFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.env.lattice.PatchLatticeFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LatticeFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatchLatticeFactoryRect, PatchLatticeFactoryTri
    public abstract class PatchLatticeFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements LatticeFactory
    Implementation ofLatticeFactory for PatchLattice objects.

    Each lattice is initialized to INITIAL_CONCENTRATION.

      • getLattice

        public abstract PatchLattice getLattice​(int length,
                                        int width,
                                        int height,
                                        double ds,
                                        double dz,
                                        MiniBox parameters)
        Creates a new PatchLattice instance.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of array (x direction)
        width - the width of array (y direction)
        height - the height of array (z direction)
        ds - the spatial scaling (x and y directions)
        dz - the spatial scaling (z direction)
        parameters - the dictionary of parameters
        Returns:
        the lattice instance
